subject: Belmont Stakes
Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: More than 100 years ago, August Belmont Jr. battled an antigambling law that shut down horse racing. He eventually won out by stressing the value of horse.
snippet: More than 100 years ago, August Belmont Jr. battled an antigambling law that shut down horse racing. He eventually won out by stressing the value of horse.
